name: Segment-ML-MultiOutputET-Train-ROI
description: Image segmentation (training) algorithm based on extremely randomized trees. Learn from annotated regions of interest (ROIs).
command-line: python run.py CYTOMINE_HOST CYTOMINE_PUBLIC_KEY CYTOMINE_PRIVATE_KEY CYTOMINE_ID_PROJECT CYTOMINE_ID_SOFTWARE CYTOMINE_ID_USERS CYTOMINE_ID_IMAGES CYTOMINE_ID_TERMS CYTOMINE_ID_POSITIVE_TERMS CYTOMINE_ID_ROI_TERM CYTOMINE_ZOOM_LEVEL PYXIT_TARGET_SIZE N_JOBS PYXIT_N_TOTAL_SUBWINDOWS PYXIT_COLORSPACE FOREST_N_ESTIMATORS FOREST_MIN_SAMPLES_SPLIT FOREST_MAX_FEATURES RANDOM_SEED

inputs.name: Cytomine users ids
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) Identifiers of users of which the annotations should be selected for training (by default, all users).

inputs.name: Cytomine images ids
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) Identifiers of images of which the annotations should be selected for training (by default, all images).

inputs.name: Cytomine terms ids
inputs.description: (Annotations filtering) Identifiers of terms of which the annotations should be selected for training (by default, all terms, roi term excluded).

inputs.name: Cytomine positive terms ids
inputs.description: When provided, binary segmentation is enabled. A subset of the terms of the cytomine_id_terms that should be considered as foreground during the segmentation.

inputs.name: Cytomine ROI term id
inputs.description: The term identifier for regions of interest (ROI) annotations. Only these areas and the annotations they contain will be considered for training the model.

inputs.name: Cytomine zoom level
inputs.description: The zoom level for reading the slides (0 for max zoom, 1 or more for smaller magnification)

inputs.name: Subwindow size (pyxit)
inputs.description: Size of the square subwindows to extract (in pixels)

inputs.name: Total number of subwindows (pyxit)
inputs.description: Total number of subwindows to extract across all ROIs

inputs.name: Colorspace (pyxit)
inputs.description: Colorspace to which the windows must be converted before training

inputs.name: Number of trees (extra-trees)
inputs.description: Number of trees to train in the random forest.

inputs.name: Minimum samples for splits (extra-trees)
inputs.description: Minimum number of samples required for splitting a tree node in the random forest.

inputs.name: Maximum number of features (extra-trees)
inputs.description: Maximum number of features to consider for determining the split in the random forest.
